response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation, tailored to elevate your experiences to unparalleled heights. I believe its worth extends far beyond its tangible aspects, making it a true asset for those who appreciate quality and exclusivity.

Given the significance of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, reflecting my desire to find the right person who truly appreciates its true worth.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it comes with the assurance of exceptional craftsmanship, unmatched features, and a promise of satisfaction that goes beyond expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, I am confident that it will become a cherished part of your collection or business.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details of this offer, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with someone who will value it as much as I do.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 750000}
